channel.title: Load from Database, or write into script
channel.description:
Well, I'm about to program the Mining and Woodcutting skills on RS2 Blitz. Now I have two options for how to write it, I can make tables in MySQL containing the information (the object ID, the ID of the empty rock, how fast the rock mines, its respawn time, etc.) and then add a class to the server that loads it, then the Mining script gets the rock information from the server. Or, I can not add anything to the server and have all the information programmed into the script.
Which do you think would work better and be more efficient?

item.title: Load from Database, or write into script
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Thanks, I decided to go with MySQL. Its always better then hardcoding stuff.

Read full topic

@foolet wrote:

I’d go with MySQL, More Organized, Should load alot faster?

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

They would both work very efficiently,
But I would personally choose MySQL.
